uvi.description:
drm/tegra: sor: Do not leak runtime PM reference

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.12.12 by commit 6fc59edf0471eacba5769a83683f3f13834d1166. For more details please see the references link.
